kDesc
Massive purple clown shoes. To complete your clown outfit. [#Legal]
Des chaussures de clown violettes énormes. Pour terminer votre costume de clown. [#Legal]
Große lilafarbene Clownschuhe zur Vervollständigung des Clownkostüms. [#Legal]
Enormi scarpe da clown viola. Per completare la tenuta da clown. [#Legal]
Zapatos morados enormes de payaso. Para completar tu traje. [#Legal]
巨大な靴でピエロのコスチュームを完成！[#Legal]
거대한 광대 신발을 신고 우스꽝스러운 걸음걸이를 연습하세요![#Legal]
Massive purple clown shoes. To complete your clown outfit. [#Legal]
巨型的紫色小丑鞋，讓您的小丑造型完美無瑕。[#Legal]
